tool_description:
Over 100+ remote jobs posted daily, free plan available!
Subscribe now and find jobs that you can do from anywhere!
name: Remote jobs API
title: Remote jobs API

api_list.name: List jobs
api_list.description: Returns a list of the most recent jobs sorted by publishing date.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://remote-jobs-api1.p.rapidapi.com/jobs/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "remote-jobs-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: List jobs free
api_list.description:
A free endpoint that can be used without a paid subscription.
Returns a list of the 10 most recent jobs sorted by publishing date.
